title: Quantum Break v2.2.2.0 RePack
description:
Title: Quantum Break
Publishing Type: RePack
Genre: Action (Shooter), 3D, 3rd Person
Developer: Remedy Entertainment / Microsoft Game Studios
Year: 2016
Platform: PC

Version: v.2.2.2.0
Language: English, Russian
V-Language: English, Russian
Tablet: Manual activation

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

? Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-6300 or better;
? 8 GB of RAM;
? graphics card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x or better
? 63 GB of free space on the drive;
? 64-bit operating system Windows 10 version 1511 or older


Features repack ::

â€¢ Do not cut | Do not recoded [1080p video]
â€¢ Game archives are not touched
â€¢ Game Version - v.2.2.2.0
â€¢ Installation time ~ 6-10 minutes (SSD)

ATTENTION! If there was a previous version repack, you must delete the last version of the activation.


Turn off antivirus programs (as well as Windows Defender) and do not load the PC during installation.
And carefully read the instructions for launching


How to do it:
1) Run the Windows PowerShell ISE on behalf of the administrator.
2) At the command prompt: Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted
3) Select: Yes for all
4) Remove-AppxPackage Microsoft.QuantumBreak_1.7.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe
5) Close: Powershell ISE
---------------------------------------
Q: Why manual activation? 

B'cause C[the drive where you install varies] does not work automatically in the game for some systems and give them errors or bugs.
----------------------------------------
Installation instructions:
----------------------------------------
User Account Control (UAC) must be disabled.

1. Remove from the root folder with the game files and AppxSignature.p7x TestLicense.xml

2. Click the shortcut Win + R and type gpedit.msc

3. In the left column of the window that opens, select the "Computer ConfigurationÂ» > Â«Administrative TemplatesÂ» > Â«the Windows ComponentsÂ» > Â«Application Package Deployment."

4. In the right column, with the first four parameters, do the following: Right click the "mouse" on the parameter > Â«Change/EditÂ» > Mark "IncludedÂ» > Â«OKÂ».

5. Open the file with Notepad (in the game folder) AppxManifest.xml line and remove the line with information about the license eleventh row
ID: mp: PhoneIdentity PhoneProductId = "240e2d24-79b2-4230-a7c5-2c31e019869a" PhonePublisherId = "c0566bf3-b08a-4984-9de3-63aea1f3eba6"

Close the file, agreeing with the changes.

6. Click "Start" and select "SettingsÂ» > Â«updates and securityÂ» > Â«For Developers" and make sure that the option "Developer mode" is selected.

7.. Start WindowsPowerShell ISE on behalf of the Administrator.

8. Sequentially enter commands. After you type each command, press the Enter key:

Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted

After entering this command, you need to click "Yes to all - AÂ»

â€œcd C:PathMicrosoft.QuantumBreak_1.5.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbweâ€
(Example: cd C: Microsoft.QuantumBreak_1.7.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe)

Add-AppxPackage -Register AppxManifest.xml 


9. Start the application "the Xbox" (from the "Start" menu) and enter the alternate account. (Or write the name of the game through the Search in Windows magnifying glass icon to the right of the Start button)
